DOC.detailed_description: This observational study recruit extremely low gestational age neonate ( < 28 week gestation ) whose mother receive full schedule prenatal glucocorticosteroids . Healthy term newly bear infant act control . At birth cord blood drawn follow analytical determination : reduce oxidized glutathione ; malondialdehyde ; superoxide dismutase ; catalase ; glutathione peroxidase ; glutathione reductase ; glutathione s-transferase . In addition , first urine void collect ortho-tyrosine/phenylalanine 8-hydroxy-2-oxo-deoxyguanosine/2-deoxyguanosine determination . Analytical data clinical outcome compare .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age < 28 week Registered used prenatal glucocorticosteroids mother Use proorantioxidant drug mother gestation Major congenital malformation Prenatal inflammation ( E.G . : chorioamnionitis ) Chromosomopathies Uncertainty gestational age
